preset.name: linux-aarch64-carbonite
preset.comment: Linux-aarch64 gcc PhysX SDK general settings

cmakeSwitch.name: PX_GENERATE_GPU_PROJECTS
cmakeSwitch.comment: Generate the GPU projects, if possible.

cmakeSwitch.name: PX_GENERATE_GPU_PROJECTS_ONLY
cmakeSwitch.comment: Generate ONLY the GPU projects, if possible.

cmakeSwitch.name: NV_USE_STATIC_WINCRT
cmakeSwitch.comment: Use the statically linked windows CRT

cmakeSwitch.name: NV_USE_DEBUG_WINCRT
cmakeSwitch.comment: Use the debug version of the CRT

cmakeSwitch.name: NV_FORCE_64BIT_SUFFIX
cmakeSwitch.comment: Force a 64 bit suffix for platforms that don't register properly.

cmakeSwitch.name: NV_FORCE_32BIT_SUFFIX
cmakeSwitch.comment: Force a 32 bit suffix for platforms that don't register properly.

cmakeParam.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX
cmakeParam.comment: Install path relative to PhysX SDK root
